channel.title: WhatsApp Business API Status
channel.description: Status updates for WhatsApp Business API

item.title: [Major disruptions]: WhatsApp Business Account Management
item.guid: WhatsApp Business Account Management update at: Wed, 14 Dec 2022 02:39:49 GMT
item.description: We are aware of an issue that may be impacting managing message templates, managing shared WhatsApp Business accounts, managing shared credit lines, managing phone numbers, accessing insights. Our engineering teams are actively looking to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

item.title: [Major disruptions]: Cloud API
item.guid: Cloud API update at: Tue, 13 Dec 2022 22:59:01 GMT
item.description: We are aware of an issue that may be impacting send messages, receive messages. Our engineering teams are actively looking to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

item.title: [Major disruptions]: Cloud API
item.guid: Cloud API update at: Wed, 14 Dec 2022 02:41:34 GMT
item.description: We are aware of an issue that may be impacting send messages. Our engineering teams are actively looking to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
